page.title: 12 STRATFORD MOP FAIR
page.content: STRATFORD-UPON-AVON WAS ORIGINALLY THE CENTRE OF A VERY RURAL,AGRICULTURAL AREA WITH MANY LARGE HOUSES AND BECAUSE OF THIS IT HOSTED YEARLY HIRING FAIRS WHERE PEOPLE COULD ALSO BUY WOOL AND OTHER WARES.ENTERTAINMENTS EG.BEAR- BAITING AND JUGGLING GRADUALLY BECAME A COMMON SIGHT AT THESE FAIRS TO ENCOURAGE TRADE.NOW TRADING HAS ALMOST STOPPED AT THESE FAIRS AND BEEN REPLACED BY FAST RIDES PROVIDING A PROFIT FOR THE "MOPPIES".THIS FAIR IS CALLED THE MOP BECAUSE AT THE EARLY HIRING FAIRS SERVANTS WOULD STAND WITH THEIR MOPS ETC.HOPING FOR EMPLOYMENT. THE MOP ARRIVES IN OCTOBER EARLY ONE MORNING AND TAKES ABOUT HALF A DAY TO SET UP.IT IS THEN OPEN TO THE PUBLIC AND ALL THE PROCEEDS FOR THAT DAY GO TO CHARITY.THE NEXT DAY IS THE ACTUAL MOP DAY AND ATTRACTS A VERY LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE ESPECIALLY IN THE EVENING.THE
